ItemDescription.Description: This item gives increased Physical Lifesteal when at low Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you drop below 35% Health, you gain an additional 25% Physical Lifesteal for 5 seconds.  Can only occur once every 15 seconds.

ShortDesc: Gain Physical Lifesteal when at low Health

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item is for Magical users and gives them a chance to gain Health and Mana.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Damaging any enemies with an ability gives you bonus 6 health and 3 mana. Can only trigger once per target per ability.

ShortDesc: Starter item for Mages that provides sustain

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Health every time they hit with a Basic Attack.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack restores 8 Health and 4 Mana. Basic Attacks that hit all enemies in melee range restore 4 Health and 2 Mana on every enemy after the first.

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks restore Health and Mana.

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item increases durability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - All damage taken is reduced by 4.
PASSIVE - Being within assist range of a minion or jungle camp monster death without dealing the killing blow awards 5 bonus gold, and also restores +12 Health and +10 Mana.

ShortDesc: Bonus Gold, Health, and Mana on minion assist.

ItemDescription.Description: Increase Speed.
Increase speed, damage, and attack speed.
These boots give the owner high Physical Power.

ShortDesc: Increases Movement Speed and Physical Power.

ItemDescription.Description: These boots give the owner Attack Speed.

ShortDesc: Increases Movement Speed and Attack Speed.

ItemDescription.Description: These boots grant the owner Crowd Control Reduction.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every time you are damaged by a god you gain a stack that provides 3 Physical and Magical Protections. Stacks up to 7 times, Lasts 6s

ShortDesc: Provides Movement Speed and Crowd Control Reduction

ItemDescription.Description: These boots grant bonus speed while out of combat.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +20% additional Movement Speed after leaving the Fountain. This effect lasts 7s.

ShortDesc: Bonus movement speed while leaving the Fountain

ItemDescription.Description: Increases Movement Speed.
Increase Speed and Magic Power.
These shoes grant magical power.
These shoes grant the owner reduced cooldowns on their abilities.
These boots grant the owner Crowd Control Reduction.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every time you are damaged by a god you gain a stack that provides 3 Physical and Magical Protections. Stacks up to 7 times, Lasts 6s

ShortDesc: Provides Movement Speed and Crowd Control Reduction

ItemDescription.Description: These boots grant the owner bonus speed out of combat.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +20% additional Movement Speed after leaving the Fountain. This effect lasts 7s.

ShortDesc: Bonus movement speed while leaving the Fountain

ItemDescription.Description: This item increases your Critical Strike Chance. Critical Strikes empower your abilities.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Successfully Hitting an Enemy God with a Critical Strike will subtract 3s from all of your abilities currently on Cooldown, except your Ultimate ability. This effect can only happen once every 5s.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner an aura that reduces nearby Enemy Gods' Attack Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemies within 55 units have their Attack Speed reduced by 25%.

ItemDescription.Description: Gain Protections when near enemy Gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - For each enemy god within 55 units of you, you gain a stacking buff that provides 10 Physical Protections and 8 Magical Protections. Stacks up to 3 times.

ShortDesc: Gain Protections when near enemy Gods

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Cooldown Reduction or MP5 based on missing Mana.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - While over 25% Mana, you gain +10% Cooldown Reduction. While under 25% Mana, you gain +50 MP5.

ShortDesc: Increased Cooldown at high Mana, Increased MP5 at low Mana

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Reduces the Physical Protection of enemies within 55 units by 5%.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Physical Power or Protections based on missing Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - While over 75% Health, you gain +25 Physical Power. While under 75% Health, you gain +40 Protections.

ShortDesc: Provides Physical Power or Protections based on missing Health

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner an aura that reduces physical protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemy gods within 55 units have their Physical Protection reduced by 15%.

ItemDescription.Description: This item provides block stacks.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every 8 seconds you gain a block stack if you have at least 80 total Protections from items and abilities, preventing 65% of the next Basic Attack's damage. For each additional 80 total Protections from items and abilities the max. stacks increases, up to a cap of 3.
PASSIVE - Physical Critical Strikes bonus damage taken is decreased by 40%.

ShortDesc: Reduces damage from Physical Critical Strikes

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner stacking Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +3 Magical Protection and +3 Physical Protection for each god kill or assist. At 7 stacks this item Evolves, providing a Health Shield that gains stacks every 2s. Shield only stacks if you have not taken or dealt damage in the last 5s. Each stack provides 10% of 100 Health +5 Per Level.

ShortDesc: Gains protection from god kills or assists. Evolves.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner stacking Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Provides a Health Shield that gains stacks every 2s. Shield only stacks if you have not taken or dealt damage in the last 5s. Each stack provides 10% of 100 Health +5 Per Level.  The full shield will regenerate after 20 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner a shield to damage when at low Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you take damage and are below 40% Health, you gain a Shield with health equal to 12% of your Maximum Health for 20s. Can only occur once every 60s.

ShortDesc: Gain a damage shield at low Health

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants the owner an aura that reduces the healing of nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemy gods within 55 units have their healing reduced by 25%. This does not stack with similar Auras.

ShortDesc: Aura that reduces the healing of nearby enemies

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's abilities to reduce the healing of their targets.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your abilities have 40% reduced healing for 5 seconds.

ShortDesc: Enemies hit by your abilities have reduced healing

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you drop below 40% Health, you gain a shield equal to 25% of your maximum Mana. This shield lasts 6s. This effect can only occur once every 90s.

ShortDesc: Gain a shield when low on Health

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Magical Protection.
Magical Power debuff aura.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemy gods within 55 units have their Magical Power reduced by 50.

ItemDescription.Description: The owner gains power as they lose health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Whenever you take Magical Damage from an enemy ability you unleash a shockwave that Silences all enemies within a range of 30 units for 1s. This effect cannot trigger more than once every 30s.

ShortDesc: Silences nearby enemies when hit by a magical ability
Provides Magical Power and Physical Protection

ItemDescription.Description: Provides stacking Physical Protections
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every 3s you receive a stack of 7 Physical Protection and 4% Reduced Damage from Physical Critical Strikes, up to a max of 5 stacks. Stacks are removed upon taking Physical Damage from gods. Stacks can only be gained after not taking Physical Damage from gods for 3s.

ItemDescription.Description: Aura reducing enemy Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemy gods within 40 units have their Physical Power reduced by 15%.
AURA - Ally lane minions within 70 units gain 25% Health and Attack Speed. Whenever an ally lane minion dies within 70 units of you, gain 5 power per stack, max 6 stacks for 15 seconds.

ShortDesc: Magical Power, Physical Protection and Minion empowerment

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Every successful Basic Attack increases your Physical Power by 10 and reduces the attack speed of your opponent by 7% for 5s. (Max. 3 Stacks)
PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your damaging Abilities take an additional 30 Physical Damage over 2s. (Max 2 Stacks)

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item for Magical users restores Mana and gives the owner bonus Damage on damaging Abilities.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Gain 1 stack every time you hit an enemy with a basic attack. If you have 5 stacks, the next time you deal damage with an ability the stacks are consumed and you gain 40 mana, and that ability and any abilities used in the next 3s will deal bonus damage equal to having +40 Magical Power for those abilities.

ShortDesc: Collect souls to deal extra damage.

ItemDescription.Description: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters. Stuns enemy gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 300 +10 per God Level damage to a single enemy minion, jungle monster or jungle boss within 15 units. The target will be the one with the highest maximum health. The  relic’s Cooldown will be reduced by 30s if you kill a jungle mob with it. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters.

ItemDescription.Description: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters. Stuns enemy gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 300 +10 per God Level damage to a single enemy minion, jungle monster or jungle boss within 15 units. The target will be the one with the highest maximum health. The relic’s Cooldown will be reduced by 30s if you kill a jungle mob with it. Also Stuns enemy gods in range for 1s. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters. Stuns enemy gods.

ItemDescription.Description: This item provides a boost after healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - After healing yourself from an ability, you gain 30% movement speed, 15 Physical Power, and 30 Magical Power for 4 seconds. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item regenerates Health and Mana on a kill or assist.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain 15% of your maximum Health and Mana over the next 3 seconds when you get a kill or assist against an enemy god or Objective.

ShortDesc: Regenerates Health and Mana on a kill or assist.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's Critical Hits to weaken Enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Critical hits on enemy gods afflict them with poison for 2s. This poison slows them by 10% and reduces their damage output by 15%.

ShortDesc: Critical Hits reduce Enemy's Movement Speed and Damage

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's Critical Hits to reduce healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your Critical Strikes have 40% reduced healing for 5s.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes your Basic Attacks to reduce the target's Physical Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Melee Basic Attacks decreases enemy Physical protections by 7, and increase your physical protection by 5 for 3s (max. 2 Stacks).

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks reduce target's Physical Protection

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemy gods within 55 units have their Magical Protection reduced by 5%.

ShortDesc: Reduces the Magical Protection of enemies

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner an aura that reduces magical protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemy gods within 55 units have their Magical Protection reduced by 10%.

ShortDesc: Aura reduces magical protection on enemies

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain 20% of the Magical protections of the nearby allied god with the highest Magical protections within 70ft.

ShortDesc: Gain Magical protection from nearby ally

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item restores its user's Health and Mana when in assist range of a slain minion.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Being in range of minion or jungle camp death without dealing the killing the blow restores 5 Health and 5 Mana to all allies within 55 units and also provides allies with a stacking self buff of 1% Movement Speed and 1% Attack Speed. Lasts 6s and stacks up to 10 times.

ShortDesc: Starter item for physical gods playing as supports

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item reduces your cooldowns when you are hit by a Physical God
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - This item grants 2 MP5 per 10% of your missing Mana

ItemDescription.Description: Increased movement speed when leaving the fountain.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Whenever you leave the fountain, you gain 40% movespeed for 15s. You will lose this speed early if you enter combat.

ShortDesc: Increased movement speed when leaving the fountain.
Bonus max Health on assists. Gold Bonus on Completing Stacks.

ItemDescription.Description: On ultimate use your next ability has no cooldown.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When your Ultimate ability has finished casting, your next non-ultimate ability cast within the next 10s will have no cooldown but will only deal 70% of its normal damage and healing. This can only occur once every 45 seconds.

ShortDesc: On ultimate use your next ability has no cooldown

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Each successful basic attack applies a hex to enemies and empowers you, increasing your power by 5% and reducing the power of your opponent by 5% for 5s. (Max. 3 Stacks).
This consumable deals 20000 True damage to Jungle Monsters around you. This only affects Monsters on your side of the Jungle.

ItemDescription.Description: Mana and Health restoration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item restores 75 Health + 12 Health per level and 30% Mana to all Allied gods within 35 units. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Protections and Damage Mitigation Buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item applies a shield to himself and allies within 35 units for 100 Health + 12 Health per God Level for 3 seconds. Additionally, all allies take 20% reduced damage from Basic Attacks while the shield is active. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Fires True Damage Projectile.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item fires a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first god hit dealing 15% of the target's Current Health as True Damage and destroying any shields. Cooldown - 110s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ghostwalk
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you and allied gods within 35 units to pass through players and player made objects for 5s. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Heals Mana and Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this restores 40% Health and Mana lost within the last 5s. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Mana and Health restoration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item restores 75 Health + 12 Health per level and 30% Mana to all Allied gods within 35 units. Allies affected by Meditation Cloak have their abilities' mana cost reduced by 30% and their Ability Cooldowns reduced by 1s upon use. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ghostwalk and Damage Reduction Buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you and allied gods within 35 units to pass through players and player made objects for 10s. It also provides a 15% Damage Mitigation Buff for 5s. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Protections and Damage Mitigation Buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item applies a shield to himself and allies within 35 units for 100 Health + 12 Health per God Level for 3 seconds. Additionally, all allies take 50% reduced damage from Basic Attacks while the shield is active. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Fires True Damage Projectile.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item fires a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first god hit dealing 15% of the target's Current Health as True Damage, destroying any shields, and increasing their damage taken by 20% for 5s. Cooldown - 110s.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces ability Cooldowns and heals Mana and Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item subtracts 3s from all abilities currently on Cooldown and restores 40% Health and Mana lost within the last 5s. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Reduces ability Cooldowns and heals Mana and Health.

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item restores its user's Health and Mana when in assist range of a slain minion.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Getting an assist when an enemy dies provides a stack that gives 1% Movement Speed and 2% Attack Speed for 8s to nearby allies up to 10 stacks. When you've gained 3 or more stacks from assists, once per ability, each time you damage an enemy god you restore 18 Health and Mana to nearby allies within 55 units and gain 10 gold. Can be upgraded at level 15.

ShortDesc: Assists empower you and your allies.
